name: Pepper Cloud CRM
description:
Pepper Cloud is an AI-powered WhatsApp CRM designed for SMEs across industries to simplify sales and customer support. It offers a reliable, affordable, and easy-to-use CRM to manage your leads, contacts, accounts, opportunities, customer service, and conversations â€” all in one place.

With powerful features for sales management, marketing automation, customer service, and business analytics, Pepper Cloud makes it easy to boost productivity and grow smarter.

Seamlessly integrated with WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, Xero, MailChimp, Zoom, Google Drive, Outlook, and more, our CRM eliminates app-switching and streamlines your workflow.
